polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Interface ConnectivityChangeListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
TopologyManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTopologyManager, SimpleTopologyManager
public interface ConnectivityChangeListener

Components implementing this interface may listen for changes in the connectivity managed by some Transport, i.e., adding/removing/crashing of links.

See Also:
Transport

Method Summary
 void notifyLinkClosed(Link link)
          This method is called whenever a link is closed.
 void notifyLinkCrashed(Link link)
          This method is called whenever a link crashes.
 void notifyLinkOpened(Link link)
          This method is called whenever a link is opened for a new neighbor of the local node.
 

Method Detail

notifyLinkOpened

void notifyLinkOpened(Link link)
This method is called whenever a link is opened for a new neighbor of the local node.

Parameters:
link - the new link.

notifyLinkClosed

void notifyLinkClosed(Link link)
This method is called whenever a link is closed.

Parameters:
link - the closed link.

notifyLinkCrashed

void notifyLinkCrashed(Link link)
This method is called whenever a link crashes.

Parameters:
link - the crashed link.
